REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2609 reute h f BC-SUMMA-<SUMA>-TO-FILE 04-08 0052

TEXT.TITLE: SUMMA <SUMA> TO FILE FOR FINANCING COMMITMENT
TEXT.BODY: Summa Medical Corp said it intends to file a prospectus with the Securities and Exchange Commission outling a commitment for a six mln dlr financing, signed yesterday. Summa said it expects the filing to take place before April 24. Reuter
